data.title: Pet Services
data.text:
Pet and Service Animal Relief Areas

The MSP maintains pet and service animal relief areas at both terminals.

There are several Terminal 1 locations. Pre-security, there are pet relief areas located outside both Door 1 and Door 4 on the Baggage Claim Level. There is also a new pet relief area outside of the Silver Parking Ramp.

Through security at Terminal 1, there are three pet relief areas available: located near the entrance to Concourse E in the Airport Mall, by Gate F6, and on the C/G Connector Bridge.

At Terminal 2, travelers can use the grassy area just outside of Door 8 on Level 1 near baggage claim or the indoor pet relief area near Gate H11.

Passengers traveling with a service animal can request an escort from their airline or Travelers Assistance to the pet relief area.

Pet and Animal Policies

All non-service animals must be kept kenneled while in the airport's facilities.

Pet Boarding

Nearby pet boarding facilities are available through Now Boarding. Located on airport property, Now Boarding allows you to drop off your beloved pet(s), park at the facility and then take a complimentary shuttle ride to your terminal for your flight. When you return, Now Boarding will pick you up from the terminal and return you to your pet and vehicle - 24 hours a day!

Now Boarding features:

Overnight boarding

Doggy day care 7 days a week

Spa treatments including grooming, massage, nail trims, pet therapy pool

Dog training services
